entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is cautious and has a wand that can control flames. He is described as having an inside pocket in his suit jacket where he keeps his wand.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is a person who is shocked and enraged when Dumbledore sets the wardrobe on fire, but then becomes frightened when something starts rattling inside it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who can hardly blame Riddle for howling in shock and rage.

entities.name: wardrobe
entities.description: The wardrobe is an object that bursts into flames when Dumbledore points his wand at it, but then returns to its original state without any damage.

entities.name: something trying to get out of your wardrobe
entities.description: Something is trying to get out of the wardrobe.

relationships.description: Dumbledore causes damage to the wardrobe by pointing his wand at it.
Riddle owns the wardrobe, as he is shocked and enraged when Dumbledore sets it on fire.
Dumbledore helps Riddle by opening the door to the wardrobe.

relationships.entity_2: something trying to get out of your wardrobe
relationships.description: The wardrobe contains something that is trying to get out.
